Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 25-2010. A 24-year-old 
woman with abdominal pain and shock.
Klempner MS(1), Talbot EA, Lee SI, Zaki S, Ferraro MJ.

Author information:
(1)National Emerging Infectious Diseases Laboratories, Boston University Medical 
Center, and Department of Medicine, Boston University School of Medicine, USA.
